sentences.sContent: If your baby is breech, may need thirty-seven weeks in vitro rotary surgery, obstetrics and gynecology doctors will hand on your belly, try to put the baby upside down.
sentences.sContent_eng: If your baby is breech, may need thirty-seven weeks in vitro rotary surgery, obstetrics and gynecology doctors will hand on your belly, try to put the baby upside down.
sentences.sCn: 如果妳的宝宝是臀位，三十七周时可能需要体外回转术，妇产科医生会将手放在妳的腹部，试着把宝宝倒转过来。

remMethod.val: 臀部 (breech) 坐在椅子 (bench) 上
